name: Counterfactual Mask Switching
description: Tests bias masking in a counterfactual scenario
notes: Counterfactual: apply a fairness mask and check that outcome changes only because criteria change, not demographics.

theory.natural_language: Current rule: loan approval uses credit score only; demographic fields are masked. Proposed counterfactual rule: include employment stability but demographics remain masked. Applicant Zoe has sufficient credit score but short employment history. Demographics must never influence approval.

queries.natural_language: Under the current rule with masking, is Zoe approved?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Sufficient credit score grants approval; demographics are masked.
expected_answer.explanation: current_rule USES credit_score_only ∧ Zoe CREDIT_SCORE sufficient

queries.natural_language: Counterfactually, would Zoe be approved if employment stability were also required?

expected_answer.natural_language: Likely not, because her employment history is short, still independent of demographics.
expected_answer.explanation: proposed_rule adds employment ∧ Zoe EMPLOYMENT_HISTORY short ∧ demographics masked
